website_summaries.verdict: If you love the effortless convenience of electric salt and pepper grinders, this sleek set is a great option, and has some nifty features, to boot.
pros: Push button operation is ideal for single-handed use
LED lighting conveniently allows you to see just how much or little you're adding
Ceramic grinding mechanisms offer improved durability and are suitable for use with most salts
Includes lids and an acrylic holder to keep surfaces clean
cons: Battery-powered operation requires replacements from time to time

customer_reviews.title: They do not last long
customer_reviews.text: Don't bother because while they worked well, they only worked for a year then they got corroded and no matter how well I cleaned them, they were destroyed... guess I will just buy disposable grinders from now on.. too bad because I LOVED the one handed use Update; I emailed the seller and they responded IMMEDIATELY, even before this review was posted; they're sending me a replacement set... so I hope the new set lasts a bit longer but the company's customer service is stellar!
customer_reviews.author: laura smith

customer_reviews.title: Contacts corroded
customer_reviews.text: After enjoying it for 5 months, the contacts of the are now so corroded that the one for salt has quit working. will need to see how the warranty can be applied to get new ones. Update: They send a replacement very fast, will see how it goes.
customer_reviews.author: Uwe Kleinschmidt

customer_reviews.title: Pricey but nice...
customer_reviews.text: I purchased this set to replace another brand that didn't last a year. These grinders operate smoothly and are a better looking fit for any kitchen décor. They are easy to fill and the coarse and fine adjustments work well. My only complaints are the price is much higher than the competition but if they last longer I'll dispense with that. The other is the caps are a bit of a nuisance to deal with when trying to reattach to the bottom. They're meant to fit only one way and I find them dropping off constantly because I didn't get it right the first time. Other than that it's a recommended buy from here.
customer_reviews.author: cager

customer_reviews.title: The product would be great but it appears the connection points where you open ...
customer_reviews.text: The product would be great but it appears the connection tabs (tits) are weak/cheaply made. If you want for aesthetic reasons then go for it but if you want functional then beware. Quality is not good. The locking point is plastic and two out of three of them broke off. I assumed it had been dropped by someone in the house. However, one of the three on the other broke off yesterday. Also, realize there is only a 30 days return window.
customer_reviews.author: Carl

customer_reviews.title: Love these salt n papper grinders.
customer_reviews.text: Edited review: may 2018 We loved these salt n pepper grinders. There are just two of us so they don’t get overly used. Yesterday, the pepper grinder just sort of disintegrated all over my eggs! I am so disappointed that they only lasted such a short time. Is there any kind of warranty on these? Love these salt n pepper battery operated grinders. Using the salt n pepper grinders is awesome! So much easier than all the twisting and grinding. I bought some Himalayan Pink salt on Amazon and had peppercorns in my pantry. Easy to fill and wonderful to use. Highly recommend! Would make an awesome gift!!
customer_reviews.author: Harborite

customer_reviews.title: Came broken
customer_reviews.text: I never got to try this because when I opened the box and took one of the mills out to fill up, I heard a rattle of some sort. Once I opened it to fill, I saw a piece of plastic broken off and was inside where you would place salt/pepper. (picture) I wrapped it back up and sent it back for a refund. I may purchase it at a later date but I am researching some other mills at this time.
customer_reviews.author: Cindy

customer_reviews.title: great quality stainless steel compared to other brands
customer_reviews.text: Absolutely love these salt and pepper mills. Bought a similar set off HSN Wolfgang Puck brand and his doesn't come close to the quality of these ones. The batteries are very easy to put in to the upper compartment. The led lights work great and they also come with caps on the bottom of them. Also, included is a tray for them to sit in. Very pleased with this purchase and I hope they last for a long time. I put sea salt in one and peppercorns in the other. Used a funnel to fill them and that saved me a lot of mess to clean up.
customer_reviews.author: Barbara A.

customer_reviews.title: Unusable
customer_reviews.text: Rarely works. I've had this for about a year and I've spent more time trying to get the batteries to connect with the contact points than actually using the grinders. I've swapped out several brand of batteries and some work for a bit, but blow on the thing and they disconnect internally. Waste of money.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Disappointed
customer_reviews.text: I want to love this product, as so many before me have, but I can barely get a dusting of salt or pepper to come out of the shaker. I tried messing with the coarseness setting to no avail and haven't found helpful resource on the interwebs.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Happy Face!
customer_reviews.text: For our dining table they were quite large, however, the paper grinder was working poorly and after 4 months it stopped working. When I emailed Latent Epicure about the problem, they immediately emailed me and sent me one in the mail. Great customer service and obviously honors their products. Just received it in the mail today! :) Hopefully, will have better luck with this pepper grinder.
customer_reviews.author: KM and DG

customer_reviews.title: Plastic base broke easily
customer_reviews.text: I would not recommend this product, thumbs down! The plastic base broke and small bits of it were mixed in with the salt, not good! This happen soon after I bought the product, I never thought to email seller until I saw someone post about this product. I continued to use the pepper mill, it lasted about a year and half and then the motor gave out. I would think it would last longer! Update: fast response from company received replacement Update #2 Bought a second for a gift after I got a replacement, the replacement broke! See attached picture, this is the replacement! The same plastic broke again.
customer_reviews.author: Disappointed

customer_reviews.title: the only thing I liked about this set was the tray that the mills ...
customer_reviews.text: the only thing I liked about this set was the tray that the mills sit in. Tried whole peppercorns first but it wouldn't grind them, so I cracked them but it still wouldn't grind very well. Bought the Himalayan coarse salt that was recommended with this product and it wouldn't grind that very well either, unless you wanted to hold the button about 5 minutes. Loved the fact that it was lighted, but this was a very big disappointment.
customer_reviews.author: Susie B.

customer_reviews.title: Defective product.  Cheaply made.
customer_reviews.text: I received a package containing 2 units. Installed batteries. One unit didn't work at all. The other unit ran continuously even when switch was not depressed and no way to stop it from running other than to take out the batteries.
customer_reviews.author: Ivan K. Rothman

customer_reviews.title: Disappointing
customer_reviews.text: Nice, Sleek design however, only last 2 months. Shakers are top heavy so when they got knocked over onto the granite countertop the salt shaker broke in half. There is no way to fix the shaker as the tabs inside the shaker broke off completely. Disappointing, especially after spending so much time researching.
customer_reviews.author: Ask Mom!

customer_reviews.title: Nice set
customer_reviews.text: I bought this to replace a salt/pepper mill that broke. In comparison I really like this set much better, for serval reasons. The best features are: - it uses 4 AA batteries vs 8 AAA. - it has a large push button to operate - it easy to fill - the build quality is 5 star - the grind is great and easily adjustable from fine to coarse - the Led light is a nice added feature Overall I think it’s a great product and a great price. You can’t go wrong with this if your in the market for one.
customer_reviews.author: William Heger

customer_reviews.title: FFF Cheap parts
customer_reviews.text: I bought these in February and 3 months later my wife notices a big (1 cm) chipped clear piece of the case sitting on top of the pepper corns. 1. Can not say how long that piece had been in there only that over half of the pepper corn had been used. 2. While trying to see where it came from found there were more then one faulty sections. 3. I cannot say how much of that cheap plastic casing we ingested ground up with the pepper corn. TOTAL FAIL!!!!!!!!!!
customer_reviews.author: DrivenOG

customer_reviews.title: Have them for months now and I think I'm going ...
customer_reviews.text: Have them for months now and I think I'm going back to the old fashioned way. While handy using one hand its not worth the wait - TOO SLOW to deliver the product. With all the batteries it uses you would think it would carry more punch. The other thing i noticed is the buttons being to slant due to use and do not retain their horizontal position which may them look a bit janky.
customer_reviews.author: Manuel Guerra

customer_reviews.title: Worked adequately until battery replacement.
customer_reviews.text: It's an ok mill at an ok price. It worked, slowly, but it worked. Not hard to make work or adjust. But, after the first time I had to replace the batteries, it quit altogether. I removed and reset the batteries several times, but no joy.....it simply doesn't work anymore. Looks like there is some corrosion in the battery compartment, likely from cheap metals. If it's to be used in the kitchen, while cooking (which generally generated steam) it needs to have more corrosion resistant components. It looks nice.... but It grinds too slowly, and the battery issue makes it a no-go for me. I like products DESIGNED to last a lifetime.....and this isn't it.
customer_reviews.author: Wiconi

customer_reviews.title: Very high quality!
customer_reviews.text: These rock! They look very high quality, and the function matches the look. The only thing I would say negative about them is that they hold a pretty small quantity of salt/pepper. Exactly what you see in the plastic windows. That said, you can very easily adjust the grind, replacing the batteries is super easy, and refilling is easy-peasy! Love the small tray they sit in. It keeps the table or counter clean. I have already had two family members purchase sets of these after using them at my house. That should tell you something right there.
customer_reviews.author: Michael Drawdy

customer_reviews.title: So glad I bought these!
customer_reviews.text: I used to use the traditional hand operated salt and pepper mill. I was at a friend's house & saw her using these. They seemed so cool!! I LOVE these grinders. I baked an entire pan of chicken thighs the other night & salt and peppering the entire pan was a breeze!! They were easy to set up and seem fairly sturdy. A few people mentioned they were dropped and broken. I think most items like this would break if you dropped them. They don't seem flimsy to me. Glad I purchased them!
customer_reviews.author: J Church

customer_reviews.title: Work great, Fantastic customer service.
customer_reviews.text: These spice grinders work great. I usually use them for a large grain Himalayan pink sea salt and Kampot pepper but I'm sure they would work for any spice. You can go from very, very fine to extremely course with a simple twist on the bottom adjustment. I did have a problem with one of the grinders when they first arrived, the motor wouldn't turn. That being said; one phone call, with the very courteous owner of the company, and two days later the replacement arrived at my home and has been working great since.
customer_reviews.author: AlphaJoel

customer_reviews.title: Don't hesitate
customer_reviews.text: Have only used Cole & Mason in the past, but this time I though I'd try another brand. Love these because they hold more salt/pepper, battery loading is much easier (and they take 2 less per shaker) and the light is white, not blue, which is offered by many of the other brands.....come on....blue light???????
customer_reviews.author: CA3333

customer_reviews.title: Rusted salt mill.
customer_reviews.text: I have written to the manufacturer and NEVER received a response. The salt mill has rusted. If I were to use it now it would be delivering rust flakes into my food. The pepper mill did not rust, only the salt mill. They sit next to each other on the same counter so one would think they would both behave the same.
customer_reviews.author: Isabel B.

customer_reviews.title: That they work well!
customer_reviews.text: Years ago I purchased battery salt and pepper mills from Williams and Sonoma, for a lot of money as in 40+ $ per mill. They were great but only lasted a few months. I returned them and got more same story. Then I found some at Marshalls for $15.00 a set Palm Restaurant which lasted for years, but unfortunately they don't do well when dropped to a tile floor. I found theses on Amazon and they came highly recommended, so far they are great, easy to fill and change grind settings. We love them and appreciate the communication from your company. Thanks
customer_reviews.author: Susan Shapiro

customer_reviews.title: Handy
customer_reviews.text: Easy to use, these are handy gadgets. I haven't had them for long, but so far so good. My experience with most of the electric salt grinders is that the salt comes out at a slower pace than the ground pepper. So, it's fine for light seasoning, but not really for measuring out any significant amounts. I did have to contact customer care with some questions and I have to say, they were EXCELLENT in their responses and attention. Thanks.
customer_reviews.author: RK

customer_reviews.title: Quality and Atractive
customer_reviews.text: They look sharp and have a very even grind, which is very easy to adjust for preferences. The consistent grind makes it easy to properly get the desired amount of seasoning with each use. LED light at bottom is helpful to see how much seasoning has been applied yet not so bright as to be distracting. Easy to see salt or pepper levels in unit. Easy to open up for batteries and item for grinding yet firmly and securely closed. Grinders feel solid in ones hand and appear to be well constructed. Included tray is nice for keeping the grinders on your counter and counter clean. A wonderful addition to a kitchen both functional and handsome.
customer_reviews.author: William Link

customer_reviews.title: Love love love!!!
customer_reviews.text: We love these little gadgets! It's easy to install the batteries and fill the containers. My fiancé said these are the best thing that ever happened to him (besides me, of course)! The lights are awesome, since we have the really awful habit of eating in front of the tv in the dark.
customer_reviews.author: kellabella

customer_reviews.title: Nice concept, not enough juice
customer_reviews.text: Too slow. That's what it comes down to. This device completely loses it's convenience when it takes you 5 times longer to season your meat. I actually hurt my hands applying more pressure on the device in order to get them to grind faster. They just don't have the POW-A!!! It's nice to not cross contaminate your beef with everything else while seasoning, but I ultimately just got frustrated using these things. Just give me a manual device with a few twist and be done and on to the grilling. I'd only recommend these to someone with more patience than myself or someone who knows how to rig these to a car battery. Returned.
customer_reviews.author: Justin323032

customer_reviews.title: Never Thought I Would Want a Battery Power Pepper Mill
customer_reviews.text: I ordered 2 of the battery powered mills for use at home hoping they would do a good job of grinding pepper. It was a pleasant surprise to find they looked very nice, came with a plastic holder and a black rubber seal to put on the bottom of the unit when not in use. Inserting the batteries was very simple as was loading the peppercorns. The light in the bottom of the mill really works when you are dining with the lights turned down. Overall this has been a excellent purchase that is a pleasure to use.
customer_reviews.author: Bill

customer_reviews.title: Very convenient for one handed use. Looks nice
customer_reviews.text: Purchased these to replace a pair made by another brand that failed after a number of years of use. Having an automatic grinder for black pepper is so convenient for one handed use. I like these much better as you can adjust the grind size. They also come with rubber caps so that you can grind and have the caps capture the grounds in case you need to measure or transfer to a container. The tray that is included for them to sit in is also very nice. Happy with my purchase so far.
customer_reviews.author: LisaLashes

customer_reviews.title: Pretty enough for permanent tabletop status
customer_reviews.text: I waited to leave a review until I received my gourmet spice peppercorns and Himalayan pink salt to fill these beautiful grinders. When I ordered them on prime day I did not realize that they were battery operated and this was a surprise that has turned out to be a wonderful bonus! I absolutely love these grinders! They are beautiful enough that they have come out of the cabinet and have achieved tabletop status
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Very nice design, until...
customer_reviews.text: Nice spice capacity, stronger design on the electrical connections, great price, easy one handed utility, looks fine. What's more to ask for? UPDATE: They did last for 8 months, but then the one I was using to grind pepper failed. Used pretty much daily in my home kitchen. The plastic spice chamber suddenly sheared off at it's connection just above the metallic base (where the ceramic grinding element resides). To my knowledge, never dropped or whacked. No visible cracks or problems with the other one of the set (used to grind coarse salt). Had a different brand that lasted multiple years with similar usage.
customer_reviews.author: Dr John

customer_reviews.title: I like the features on these that seem to work BETTER/EASIER ...
customer_reviews.text: I haven’t have these very long, but so far I’m impressed! I like the features on these that seem to work BETTER/EASIER than two previous brands of electric grinders I have had - grind coarse/fine adjustment/direction on the bottom, only 4AA batteries that are easy to put in, and the lock/unlock filling procedure. So far, I have a nice “fine” coarseness on the Himalayan pink sea salt, and a bit more coarse on the Costco Black peppercorns. These DO grind peppercorns - something my previous brand “Beyond Flavor” wouldn’t do at all.
customer_reviews.author: Nick

customer_reviews.title: Top heavy, cracked immediately- poor design
customer_reviews.text: I really wanted to like these, but they are extremely top heavy, so they fall over constantly. They are also substantial, so when they do fall over, the plastic cracks, especially at the connectors. That is why our photos show them cracked and taped back together. I would not recommend purchasing these.
customer_reviews.author: luv2fmam

customer_reviews.title: Almost two years old and going strong
customer_reviews.text: I wrote a review shortly after purchasing these in 2017. However, that was almost two yrs ago. Everytime I use this, I think "I should update my review". So, in updating, I want to say I am so happy to have these in my kitchen. I use them daily, keeping them by my cooktop. They are easy to clean and I think we have only replaced the batteries once. They are easy to fill...I like "no cord to the outlet" YES, if you are considering these, buy them. I am glad I did!
customer_reviews.author: C. sandkamp

customer_reviews.title: Very happy with this product - great customer service
customer_reviews.text: I received this pepper/salt grinder set and noticed immediately that one of the grinders had a motor that sounded like it was dying. I checked the batteries first to ensure they were put in correctly and everything checked out. I contacted Customer Service and lo and behold - the owner of the company, James contacted me back immediately. I explained the situation to him - provided some information and I received my new grinder within a couple of days. It is perfect. I love the look of this set and it is clear that James is very committed to providing great customer service. Very happy with this product and look forward to using for a long time.
customer_reviews.author: L. Boyd

customer_reviews.title: Very easy to handle and operate
customer_reviews.text: I was surprised at the quality, for the price that I paid for them. Very reasonably priced and easy to operate , especially if you have arthritis. They are light weight, easy to hold. They are very attractive in my kitchen. They are brushed stainless steel and so are the appliances in my kitchen. Couldn't have asked for a better product . I love my new salt and pepper grinders.
customer_reviews.author: DIANE

customer_reviews.title: Okay but pepper doesn’t grind fast
customer_reviews.text: Salt works good. Pepper grinder is slow and doesn’t grind up the peppercorn very well. I tried different settings. If you like to put a lot of pepper on your food, this isn’t for you. They’ll find your skeletal remains before you reach the pepper saturation point.
customer_reviews.author: HarryC

customer_reviews.title: Not disappointed
customer_reviews.text: These take 4, yes 4 AA each. They do work well. It does take longer for the pepper to grind, but it has never once stopped or not worked. I have only used pink Himalayan salt and it grinds that with ease. I have only used the bulk bottles of whole peppercorns and pink Himalayan salt from costco. I like the light on the bottom and the fact that you can truly adjust the desired course of what your grinding. 1 handed use is vital for cooking and handling different raw meats with no fear of contamination.
customer_reviews.author: Anita J.

customer_reviews.title: Retail business with a heart.
customer_reviews.text: Everyone in the family loves the salt and pepper mills. When I discovered a minor problem with one of the mills, I contacted James Simpson (Owner of Latent Epicure). He responded immediately and told me that a replacement mill was already being shipped. By the way, the minor problem did not impact the functionality of the product. It's refreshing to realize that there are still captains of industry out there who believe in their products and back them up with a personal and immediate response. Thank you James.
customer_reviews.author: Marty

customer_reviews.title: Great product and Excellent Customer Service
customer_reviews.text: I received my Salt and Pepper grinders and immediately set them up. Unfortunately, one did not work properly. I sent an email to the seller, and James responded very promptly. After a couple of suggested fixes, which did not work, a replacement mill was sent out and received in a couple of days. The replacement works perfectly. Sometimes thing do not always go 100%, but how the seller responds is what matters. This seller did what should be done and has a happy customer!!!
customer_reviews.author: Randall B. Gobey

customer_reviews.title: Very good set. Works well and look nice
customer_reviews.text: I like how they look, how much salt & pepper corns they hold along with how they work as a whole. You can adjust the coarseness very nicely (I like my pepper to be very cores where are my salt not so). Battery life seems to be very good. Only one very small thing is that the device for pepper seems to real "hard" to break down the pepper. I have not had it long enough to know who this will effect battery live or the live of the device.
customer_reviews.author: S. Silva

customer_reviews.title: A gadget well worth having
customer_reviews.text: We were given a set of these mills as a gift. Our grandson, who has limited vision, was totally impressed with them. We purchased a set of the Latent Epicure mills for him. They are even better than the gift brand we had. Very easy to open, load and use. The coarse-fine adjustment works well and the light is great for vision challenged people. The set comes with a extra tray to keep the pair together. You can find powered mills cheaper, but these are the best we've seen. The first set sent to us had one defective grinding mechanism. The vendor replaced immediately, no questions or hassle.
customer_reviews.author: Sare

customer_reviews.title: Don't waste your money
customer_reviews.text: Bought these as a gift. Fresh out of the box, they do not work. Since it was so long before my daughter found a house, it's too late to return the gift. Act like it's operating but nothing comes out. Very disappointed that I wasted my money.
customer_reviews.author: Marie  Smith

customer_reviews.title: Convenient Equipment
customer_reviews.text: We use a lot of pepper and needed a tool to add the ingredient quickly and efficiently. Our first purchase was used only for pepper. The ability to adjust the coarseness of the grind was perfect. Since we have multiple prepping and eating areas I decided to purchase another set, one of which would be for salt. This tool has been a great solution for our personal preferences and ease of use. They work so great I am thinking of purchasing another set.
customer_reviews.author: gerarda barbato

customer_reviews.title: Attractive and functional! Saves my wrists!
customer_reviews.text: I have a very painful tendon problem in my wrists, but I love fresh ground pepper. Bought these because a prior set we had totally died (different brand) Comparatively, these are much higher quality and better design than the previous set. A real bonus is having the clear plastic base to set them in. Captures all the extra fines. Really like these, so I'm hoping they last a long time! (4 months so far and they are great!)
customer_reviews.author: lapoljo

customer_reviews.title: Great value, good size, grinds well
customer_reviews.text: These grinders replaced more expensive grinders from Crate and Barrel, but they were 3x the price! These are a little smaller, but large enough. I like the clear tray. I took off the rubber bottoms, since the tray catches the extra salt and pepper, and I don't want to have to remove those each time I use them. I have not used them outside with the grill yet, but I do have dinner parties outside sometimes, so appreciate the light.
customer_reviews.author: NW

customer_reviews.title: The quality appears to be good overall but I have one complaint
customer_reviews.text: The quality appears to be good overall but I have one complaint. The control at the bottom doesn't lock into position at any point in the range. It just twirls around without stopping so you can't be sure about the size of the flakes you are getting. I am still fooling around with it. Hopefully I get some clarity on this. If not, I will send it back.
customer_reviews.author: jeff 88 keys

customer_reviews.title: Do not buy!!!
customer_reviews.text: One grinder would not shut off. The button was depressed and would only stop grinding if you removed the batteries. The other one would not grind at all. When the button was pushed it faintly started to grind and would immediately stop or would not start at all.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Lots of fun, well built, and reasonably priced, We highly recommend!!
customer_reviews.text: I love it! Everyone who has joined us for dinner since this purchase, has asked where we purchased this set, so they could do so. The set is very well made and should last us many years. We are very happy with our purchase, and would highly recommend this salt and pepper set! Buy it, you won't be disappointed!
customer_reviews.author: Rick

customer_reviews.title: A Touch Of Class
customer_reviews.text: Absolutely beautiful salt and pepper set that will add a touch of class to your kitchen or your table. It is very easy to use. The instructions are easy to read and very easy to understand. Being a senior citizen, I sometimes have difficulty with my hands in twisting open bottles or jars, but I found that latex gloves do the trick. This set is very modern and sleek. As a matter of fact, this would make an excellent wedding gift.
customer_reviews.author: MARY BERRIOS-VALDES

customer_reviews.title: Nice grind, easy to use, attractive.
customer_reviews.text: I bought this set to replace a previous very noisy electric pepper mill. The sound is much softer, no problem at all. And the grind is perfect for me as-is (but it's adjustable if you want finer or more coarse). Very happy with these. And the little clear tray that's included is helpful for keeping any excess contained. Love the set, highly recommend, will probably gift it in the future.
customer_reviews.author: Dianna

customer_reviews.title: Doesn't grind pepper-update
customer_reviews.text: Worked ok for several months then the pepper mill stopped grinding. Runs and dispenses a very very small amount of pepper. To get the equivalent of three twists of a regular mill takes a minute with this grinder. If you can find the Sur la Table electric salt and pepper mills get them. Received a replacement grinder from Latent Epicure. Thank-you. Bit of advice, clean the pepper grinder after every refill. Doesn't take that long and helps to insure a consistent amount of pepper. Don't buy these.
customer_reviews.author: Jeffrey

customer_reviews.title: Good, but sloooooow
customer_reviews.text: These aren't bad. The look good, and it's easy to see what is in each, and how much. These are easy to reload, easy to change the batteries, and easy to adjust the grind size. It is, however, really really slow at grinding any amount of pepper. If you're super patient, they're fine. If you occasionally need to grind lots of pepper, you'll want to get a good hand grinder for that.
customer_reviews.author: S. Greene

customer_reviews.title: Disappointing
customer_reviews.text: I really liked these at first! But after 2 months of use, the one with peppercorns stopped working! The light came on dim, and no grinding. We thought a wire must be loose, so got out a screwdriver and took it apart. We found a disconnected wire, but it was so brittle, there was no chance of soldering it. They used old brittle wiring! I guess the salt grinder will be going out soon.
customer_reviews.author: TSmith

customer_reviews.title: More handy than I thought
customer_reviews.text: I actually only bought these for cooking because I found myself frequently with only one hand available when two were needed to grind salt or pepper. This solves the problem really well. They have a nice adjustable grind level, and have been working well for a couple of months so far (on one set of batteries). The pepper takes a bit longer to grind, but that's just the nature of pepper.
customer_reviews.author: T.C.Zee

customer_reviews.title: Great product
customer_reviews.text: Update: Had them now for 4 months, they use up a set of batteries in about a month, on my 3 set now and going to have to change them soon. When the batteries get low you’ll know, the motor starts hanging up and slowing down when grinding salt and pepper. I like them, just wish the battery life was longer. Original review: Very nice salt and pepper grinder set. Was very impressed with the quality and how easy it is to put the batteries and/or salt and pepper in them.
customer_reviews.author: Calvin D

customer_reviews.title: Awesome salt & pepper set!
customer_reviews.text: We've been using these for a few weeks now with no complaints. Love the ease of just pushing the button on the top when you have dirty hand while cooking. The pepper mill on another battery-operated set we owned broke very early on, but this set feels very durable and well made. I was also annoyed by the salt and pepper building up on my counter from the other set. The mill rest is such a great feature that makes this product extra awesome!
customer_reviews.author: Heather

customer_reviews.title: MUST HAVE; GREAT GIFT... EVEN IF IT'S FOR YOURSELF!!
customer_reviews.text: I bought a set for myself as I like to cook, love their appearance, plus, who doesn't love fresh cracked salt and pepper to their food?!?!?! My adult children, who also love to cook, noticed them sitting on my stove top, and commented on them, while they were home prior to the holidays. I thought immediately that I'd get each a set for Christmas.... And I did.😁 You can adjust the coarseness of the S&P at the bottom of the dispensers. When you push the button, on top, to add the seasoning, to your culinary masterpieces, a light comes on so you can see how much you're applying. Enjoy!!
customer_reviews.author: CoCo Koontz

customer_reviews.title: Our second set of Latent S&P
customer_reviews.text: This is our second set of Latent S&P. The last set lasted a couple of years, which is great when compared to others that we have tried. It is very handy, especially the built in light which shines on what is being seasoned. Each one uses 4 AA batteries. Others have used two AAA batteries which is really not enough power.
customer_reviews.author: Ollie

customer_reviews.title: Quality and Great Customer Service
customer_reviews.text: This set is robust, nice looking, and works well. It has an adjustable grind, which is hugely important. The light that turns on, focusing on the target of the grind, is a nice touch! They take 4 AAs, and batteries last a long time. They're comfortable, easy to handle, and they look really good in person. I had a problem with one of my grinders, where the threading of the drive shaft was too narrow, and adjust the grind caused the adjustment knob and other parts to come out. I wrote the company, and the owner took care of it immediately. It was great customer service. I'd buy this set again or give it as a gift, no hesitation.
customer_reviews.author: WanderGypsySoul

customer_reviews.title: So far, so good!
customer_reviews.text: Only four stars because I haven't had it too long and these things tend to die quickly. So far this one works beautifully, I love the light feature so you can see how much (salt in my case) you're putting on. I haven't figured out how to change the grain size, but that's my own fault. I'll update in a couple months and if it's still holding up, 5 stars.
customer_reviews.author: LuLu

customer_reviews.title: Not very durable
customer_reviews.text: So the 5 stars is for the customer service. This seller really cares about his customers and product. One of my mills fell apart at the bottom and he sent me a new one right away. The mills are also very well put together. My issue was somewhat self inflicted. I might have cross threaded the nut at the bottom. Maybe. Anyways....def worth it! Update: Not very durable. They dont stand up to grinding himalayan salt very long. Both are shot. Even did maintenance as instructed. You'll get a few months out of em.
customer_reviews.author: jeff wright

customer_reviews.title: Loud but works like a gem
customer_reviews.text: It arrived with a chip of plastic broken off where the salt or pepper is held. But it still works. Didn’t want to hassle returning it during the holidays. Easy to load with salt and pepper as well as batteries. It is not a quiet mill but the light while grinding and ease of use make it tolerable. If someone struggles with using their hands i.e. arthritis, this is a helpful tool.
customer_reviews.author: MoMo

customer_reviews.title: Great design and easy to use
customer_reviews.text: I bought this set for my mother and she fell in love with them! They look so stylish and used them as a decoration on her dining table. The grinders include a practical bottom covers, which helps to keep my kitchen clean. They're super easy to use - even with one hand, which is great for when you're cooking! They're easy to use, fill and grind great.
customer_reviews.author: A Bartels

customer_reviews.title: PERFECTION!
customer_reviews.text: I have absolutely zero complaints with this thing. It's perfect. The pepper and salt grind quickly. Doesn't jam. Batteries last for months. They look sleek and I've already received compliments on them. Worth the money!!! One annoying complaint: The little plastic clear piece that these sit in is way too big. Looks odd. I just threw it away and set these out on their own. Love em!
customer_reviews.author: MJ

customer_reviews.title: I had forgotten how great it is to use good battery operated salt & ...
customer_reviews.text: I finally bought these to replace my old set. WOW! I had forgotten how great it is to use good battery operated salt & pepper mills.With grind adjust! These work great. Very happy with purchase. And they come with a platform to place your mills so excess salt & pepper does get all over your counter or cabinet.Wonderful product. would buy again.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Good quality product.
customer_reviews.text: I had another set I used for 6+years that are not anywhere near the quality these are!! You can feel the quality and I like that you can change the courseness of the grind very easily. Also it is easy to add the salt or pepper and easy to change the batteries. I have only had these for a week or so, but I anticipate many years of happy grinding as I cook!! These grinders were delivered quicker than I anticipated and I am considering by a set for my adult kids.
customer_reviews.author: Alex L Steininger

customer_reviews.title: Best customer service ever and a great product!!!
customer_reviews.text: I have had my Latent Epicure Salt and Pepper Grinders for a couple of years and love them! I have Himalayan Course Pink Salt in one and Whole Black Tellicherry Peppercorns in the other. They do a great job and I like the light so I can see how much I am using. I recently had an issue with one of the mills and contacted James at Latent Epicure and he responded extremely fast and offered to help me out and make it right. I have never had better customer service then I did with Latent Epicure! I HIGHLY RECOMMEND them!
customer_reviews.author: Big Dave

customer_reviews.title: Had an issue but they made it right!
customer_reviews.text: Bought this for my mom for Christmas as she has Arthritis and can’t use regular grinders. She received them and the salt shaker once she put batteries in wouldn’t stop (continuously grinded). I immediately contacted the seller and they got back to me ASAP and resent another salt grinder and that one works perfect. She loves the set and really happy with the response from the seller.
customer_reviews.author: monica long

customer_reviews.title: 8 AA batteries for this?!!!!
customer_reviews.text: 4 AA size batteries for each... For just salt and pepper grinder?!! How long will it last. No way to manually operate either. I want control so i can find exactly the amount i like.
customer_reviews.author: M. Singri

customer_reviews.title: Such a great kitchen appliance!!!
customer_reviews.text: I am absolutely in love with this salt and pepper grinder set! They are very user-friendly and much easier to open to refill both salt and pepper and also batteries then other ones I have tried before! The grinding quality is awesome and of course when you want it and extra fine when you want it! They look beautiful and I love the little tray included! I am such a fan that I purchased a few more as gifts for family and friends!
customer_reviews.author: Uzzee

customer_reviews.title: Great customer service
customer_reviews.text: I purchased a salt and pepper mill. The mills appeared to be grinding slowly and would not light up (there’s a small light at the bottom of the device to see the salt and pepper coming out). The pepper stopped working all together despite using new batteries. The products we’re about six months old. I reached out to the manufacture (Latent). Without even asking they quickly replaced the product with a new set. I really love the design and durability. They don’t have the best battery life and you always want to make sure you use brand new batteries but overall I am very happy with this product. Furthermore, very pleased with the communication from the customer service team.
customer_reviews.author: Peaches🍑

customer_reviews.title: Great set!
customer_reviews.text: I bought this set for my husband for Christmas and he loves them! I can’t comment on the battery life yet however we love the product and have used it daily. Grinds the salt and pepper finely and we love the light so you can see exactly where the seasoning is going. Definitely would recommend and am recommending to all those that comment on ours!
customer_reviews.author: pharm87

customer_reviews.title: Not sure why this is getting high reviews
customer_reviews.text: Prior to this review I had variant of this sort:  It worked great for over a year and then the motor died. I bought this silver one based on the reviews and I must say, I am not impressed. The motor struggles grinding the pepper (brand new Duracell batteries) and the light is dim (can barely see it in a well lit kitchen) and flickers when in use. Not worth the $20 cost!
customer_reviews.author: Thomas J. Janik

customer_reviews.title: We think these grinders are wonderful Our friends had them and they became our dinner ...
customer_reviews.text: We think these grinders are wonderful Our friends had them and they became our dinner conversation because they liked theirs so well. We've used manual grinders for many years but made the switch and think "so far so good"! The seller was prompt and items are exactly as described. Nice quality and good-looking enough to set on the table for any dining experience.
customer_reviews.author: gahusker

customer_reviews.title: It is easy to use, it compliments any kitchen.
customer_reviews.text: I love it. I was gifted a few years ago of a high end set by a well know chef. It was not easy to load the peppercorns, to replace the six aaa batteries and the it just died. I searched stores to no avail. Then I found latent and I fell in love. Easy to load the peppercorns, only two batteries. But the tray to sit it in was th hit. Very very satisfied. Took the
customer_reviews.author: pfashion is my pashion

customer_reviews.title: No thanks.
customer_reviews.text: Super cheapo and takes forever to grind just a pinch of pepper would take all day if you tried to use this to season while cooking. Seem way under powered the light gets really dim and is basically worthless when grinding. Not sure where all these good reviews come from but I wish I would have gotten something else.
customer_reviews.author: Scott

customer_reviews.title: Very clean and work well
customer_reviews.text: These are awesome. They look much better than an alternate set I bought as a gift for my Aunt. The tray they sit in is necessary because otherwise the salt will get all over everything. I think this might be a common problem for electric grinders. I love being able to grind. The only down side is that the adjustment for coarse vs. fine doesn't really do anything. All the salt is pretty fine.
customer_reviews.author: Martegy

customer_reviews.title: Very satisfied
customer_reviews.text: I absolutely love this set! I love the fact that you don’t have to twist a grinder to make it work. It’s very easy to use and convenient. I do need to say that one of them arrived with a broken top and before I could even think about sending it back the owner reached out to me to ask if I was happy with the product and when I told him how I received it he sent me out a replacement within two days. So on top of loving the product the customer service was also awesome!
customer_reviews.author: G. A. Williamson

customer_reviews.title: Does the job and does it well
customer_reviews.text: Upon purchase the motor on one mill did not work. I wrote an email to the address in the instructions and had a new one in three days. Since they have have both been working as advertised. The great customer service more than made up for the initial glitch.
customer_reviews.author: A. Caplan

customer_reviews.title: Seller truly wants customers happy.
customer_reviews.text: Slow grind. Update 11 Jun '18: After initial 1 star review, seller reached out with ideas on how to make the grinder work better. When those hints failed they sent me a new one, (free of charge and I didn't have to return the defective one) that works much better. Seller truly wants customers happy.
customer_reviews.author: catsnuckin

customer_reviews.title: Latent Epicure Salt and Pepper  mill
customer_reviews.text: I can' t say enough about Latent Epicure. I received my salt and paper mill, and the salt mill did not work, so I notified their customer service. I received a response from the owner, the same day, and said a new replacement was on its way. I received it yesterday (2 day delivery). I am so impressed with this company.The mill was everything I expected, and I am sure we will use it for years. I highly recommend this company.
customer_reviews.author: Candy

customer_reviews.title: The chef is happy!
customer_reviews.text: My husband does a lot of the cooking in our house, and he mentioned this set as an idea for a Christmas gift. It was delayed a bit by bad weather, but showed up on Christmas Eve! I had time to wrap it and see him open it. Every day since, he has been exclaiming, "I LOVE my pepper and salt grinders so much!" They work just as described and he is especially impressed by the LED light that illuminates the amount of spice that he is adding. This was very affordable and worth every penny!
customer_reviews.author: Laura L. Abuhl

customer_reviews.title: Noisy but works well
customer_reviews.text: I'd put off buying replacement grinders for my set that died because I could never decide due to conflicting reviews. When I saw this come up on Prime day and it had reasonably good reviews I thought I should go for it. Even though the percent discount was less with the pair, it was still a better deal. The pair comes with a plastic stand that looks OK but doesn't function that well for moving them as they tend to fall off, yet the caps on the bottom tend to stick. The grinders work well but are noisier than ones I've had in the past. Overall I'm satisfied with these and they were fairly reasonable.
customer_reviews.author: odie33

customer_reviews.title: Battery usage
customer_reviews.text: I really enjoy these salt and pepper grinders Very much! I don’t know a true battery use yet because I have not had to change any batteries out yet. The only issue on battieres is you have to use 4 AA in each one and that could be costly if the batteries die down quickly. May update later, if I remember, on battieres
customer_reviews.author: Nieleen hargis

customer_reviews.title: Best electric grinders out there
customer_reviews.text: Great product and amazing company took care of me when one failed I will continue to buy these. The grinders last a significant amount of time on the batteries and they have amazing durability and build quality. I recommended these to everyone. Additional plus is that the refill and battery are different compartments making it easy to use.
customer_reviews.author: D. Lasater

customer_reviews.title: One of the grinders stoped working
customer_reviews.text: The salt grinder stopped working, we changed out the batteries thinking it would be fine, but it just didn't work. So now We just have one grinder working. Very disappointed.
customer_reviews.author: TB

customer_reviews.title: Great Grinder Set!
customer_reviews.text: These are fantastic! Easy to use, press the top button and VIOLA! They even have a light that lets you see how much salt and pepper you are grinding onto your food. Look great on the table as well. Comes with a little tray to sit them in to prevent little particles of salt and pepper from getting on your table. Looks very classy and works like a charm. Would highly recommend this set if you're in the market!
customer_reviews.author: Jocelyn Allen

customer_reviews.title: Poorly designed
customer_reviews.text: Pepper mill broke in the first week. The way the battery attached to the grinder is really weak
customer_reviews.author: jguyton07

customer_reviews.title: Excellent salt and pepper grinders
customer_reviews.text: I love these. I got them to replace manual grinders which weren't working well. I can stir a pot with one hand and salt with the other. They're very pretty and they work well.
customer_reviews.author: J. Moore

customer_reviews.title: Great Idea
customer_reviews.text: Our old electric pepper mill had the batteries and peppercorn feeds both open at one time. Of course it fell open and into the gravy went the peppercorns and batteries. This one has a better light, separate battery compartment, and an easier to stock battery size. We prefer a "pinch" of salt so we'll use both mills for peppercorns.
customer_reviews.author: Sadly wiser

customer_reviews.title: great gift for others or yourself
customer_reviews.text: I love the new salt and pepper mills. We like ground pepper and have really not had fresh ground salt. Both are so much more flavorful and you don't need as much as a result. These are so easy since battery operated..no cranking and sticking and twisting. I got them for myself but will sure keep them in mind for gifts.
customer_reviews.author: Karen Harris

customer_reviews.title: Sensible Solution
customer_reviews.text: Yes, these grinders are easy to hold and use. They would also make nice gifts. However it's too soon to provide a five star rating. Each grinder requires 4 AA batteries. There's no way to know how long it will be until replacement is necessary. For some folks this could be inconvenient or a cost burden. Additionally, it's too soon to comment on the long-term efficacy of the grinding mechanism. Those considerations aside, I'm pleased with these devices.
customer_reviews.author: Anthony N. Dicesaro

customer_reviews.title: Wonderful salt and pepper mills.
customer_reviews.text: I love these mills. They have a light on the bottom so you don't use too much and are a beautiful brushed stainless steel. I especially like having the little stand underneath to keep the counter clean. Most of them don't have that. If you ever need to contact this seller with a problem they are on it right away! No worries.
customer_reviews.author: Diane Atherton

customer_reviews.title: These are great!! I first saw them in France several ...
customer_reviews.text: These are great!! I first saw them in France several years ago, but they cost about $125. So I passed. Saw them on Amazon at a bargain price. The day they arrived I received an e-mail from the owner checking to see if I was satisfied with them. Actually, the flow seemed weak. I wrote back to him about this. He told me to check if the batteries were properly inserted.. I checked,and, sure enough, I put them in backwards. I reversed them to the proper position, and the thing flowed perfectly. Never saw such initiative from any seller in my life pay. Very impressed. Highly recommend
customer_reviews.author: Timothy John Smith

customer_reviews.title: Great mills!  Easy to load and operate.
customer_reviews.text: Excellent salt/pepper mills! We have tried two other brands before, and these are clearly superior! They are not heavy from a lifting/usability standpoint, but they have a certain weight to them which tends to go hand-in-hand with quality, in my opinion. I especially like the ease of installing batteries and filling the salt/pepper chambers. Other's we've tried have clumsy battery installation, these are much more elegant. Simply twist and remove the top, drop in the 4 AAs, and replace the top with a twist - easy squeezy. The adjustment for coarse/fine grinds is easy to understand and use. The motors sound good and had no trouble with black peppercorns and Himalayan pink salt. We are very happy with this product.
customer_reviews.author: Matt Wade

customer_reviews.title: Great product. Works very well and like the light ...
customer_reviews.text: Great product. Works very well and like the light at the bottom when in use as well as the catch tray the shakers sit in as to not make a mess on the table or counter and make it truly a one handed operation. Daughter came for visit and used them once as is in the process of ordering a set for herself.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Great salt and pepper grinders for the price
customer_reviews.text: Comparable to what is offered in high-end kitchen stores, but a fraction of the price. Salt and pepper is ground finely and is so easy to use with the push of a button. In addition, having a light shining on food makes it easier to season to taste. Overall a great product for the price.
customer_reviews.author: T at Amazon

customer_reviews.title: Bad quality
customer_reviews.text: I am very disappointed about this product. The first item received was defective, and the customer service sent me replacement immediately. However the 2nd one lasted only 2 months. I wanted return, but Amazon return policy is only one month. I am sorry to say that this item is a bad quality.
customer_reviews.author: A. Robin
